meanings.definition: A class of chemical compounds containing a six-membered ring with two nitrogen atoms.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study diazines to understand their chemical properties.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician identified several diazines in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The diazines in the experiment decided to throw a nitrogen party.
meanings.sent4: The diazines danced around the ring of nitrogen atoms like a chemical carousel.
meanings.sent5: The unique structure of diazines makes them stand out in the world of chemistry.

meanings.sent1: The researchers found many diazines in their analysis.
meanings.sent2: She collected various diazines for her collection.
meanings.sent3: The diazines on the shelf seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The diazines lined up neatly, like soldiers ready for duty.
meanings.sent5: The jar was filled with colorful diazines, each with its own unique pattern.
